about_the_game:
Dress to impress this Halloween with the supernatural Spooky Night in Senenthia Skin Pack! This terrifying pack contains 10 killer character skins and one eerily exclusive cardback, the perfect preparation for the spookiest time of year.

Beware: A sinister moon rises over Senenthia, and monsters lurking in the shadows are coming out to play!

Spooky Night in Senenthia brings this chilling cast of characters to your Across the Obelisk roster of heroes:

  • Vampiress Evelyn
  • Reginald, the Frankenstein’s Monster
  • Gravekeeper Heiner
  • Nezglekt, the Scarecrow
  • Sylvie, the Witch
  • Boogeyman Grukli
  • Wilbur, the Martian
  • Mariachi Gustav
  • Magnus, the Count
  • Malukah, the Corpse Bride
detailed_description:
Free Update


About the Game



Dress to impress this Halloween with the supernatural Spooky Night in Senenthia Skin Pack! This terrifying pack contains 10 killer character skins and one eerily exclusive cardback, the perfect preparation for the spookiest time of year.

Beware: A sinister moon rises over Senenthia, and monsters lurking in the shadows are coming out to play!

Spooky Night in Senenthia brings this chilling cast of characters to your Across the Obelisk roster of heroes:

  • Vampiress Evelyn
  • Reginald, the Frankenstein’s Monster
  • Gravekeeper Heiner
  • Nezglekt, the Scarecrow
  • Sylvie, the Witch
  • Boogeyman Grukli
  • Wilbur, the Martian
  • Mariachi Gustav
  • Magnus, the Count
  • Malukah, the Corpse Bride

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
